topics.title: Topic
topics.description: Hello there this is a nice topic

workshops.description: The Web's place in history as a flexible & fluid way to store documents is well assured. But in a post-PC world, it's work to do, and it's looking a little out of its depth.The Web's best hope for the future is if we think about it a little differently and admit what we mustdo to address its shortcomings.
workshops.extendedDescription: The Web's place in history as a flexible & fluid way to store documents is well assured.
